SELECT /* DetailsMapper.stockDetailsList */ NO, STOCK_NAME, STOCK_QUANTITY, DIVIDEND_CYCLE, PURCHASE_PRICE, DIVIDEND_AMOUNT, CLSCD, RGSTDATE FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO where CLSCD != 'N'
and STOCK_NAME = #{stockName}
and (DIVIDEND_CYCLE like #{dividendCycle} || '%' or DIVIDEND_CYCLE = '월' )
order by DIVIDEND_CYCLE
SELECT /* DetailsMapper.selectBox */ NO, STOCK_NAME, STOCK_QUANTITY, DIVIDEND_CYCLE, PURCHASE_PRICE, DIVIDEND_AMOUNT, CLSCD, RGSTDATE FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO where 1=1 order by STOCK_NAME desc
mapper.update: UPDATE /* DetailsMapper.detailsUpdate */ STOCKPORTFOLIO SET STOCK_NAME= #{stockName}, STOCK_QUANTITY=#{stockQuantity}, DIVIDEND_CYCLE=#{dividendCycle} , PURCHASE_PRICE=#{purchasePrice}, DIVIDEND_AMOUNT=#{dividendAmount}, CLSCD= #{clscd} , RGSTDATE=sysdate WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE /* DetailsMapper.detailsDelete */ STOCKPORTFOLIO SET CLSCD= 'N' , RGSTDATE=sysdate WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT /* DetailsMapper.stockDetailList : 주식 상세 조회 */ A.STOCK_NAME , --주식명 A.STOCK_QUANTITY, --주식보유수 A.PURCHASE_PRICE, --매입금 A.STOCK_QUANTITY * A.PURCHASE_PRICE AS PURCHASE_PRICE_SUM, --매입금(합계) SUM(NVL(B.AMOUNT, 0)) AS AMOUNT --배당금(누적) FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO A , TRANSACTION B WHERE A.STOCK_NAME = B.STOCK_NAME(+) AND A.STOCK_QUANTITY > 0 AND A.STOCK_NAME <> '테스트' AND A.STOCK_NAME = #{STOCK_NAME} GROUP BY A.STOCK_NAME , A.STOCK_QUANTITY, A.PURCHASE_PRICE ORDER BY A.STOCK_NAME
